original: Östling, Per Gustaf Folke, kyrkoherde, Horn, f. 7/8/02 i Regna, Östergötl. 1., av Per Ö. o. Gerda Wetterholm. G. 3’3 m. Karin Carlsson. Barn: Gerd f. 34, Gudrun 36, Gunilla 39, Per 41. — Stud:ex. i Norrköp. 23, teol. fil. ex. 25, teol. kand. 28, prakt, teol, prov o. prästv. f. Linköp. stift 29. V. kom-min. i Hycklinge 29, konimin. där 30, sjömanspast. i Antv^erpen 32, kyrkoh. i Horn 36. Ordf. i kyrko- o. pastoratsstämma, kyrkofullm. o. skolstyr.
translated: Östling, Per Gustaf Folke, pastor, Horn, b. 7/8/02 in Regna, Östergötland, 1st child of Per Ö. and Gerda Wetterholm. Married on 3/3, Karin Carlsson. Children: Gerd b. 34, Gudrun b. 36, Gunilla b. 39, Per b. 41. — Completed secondary school in Norrköping in 1923, received a degree in philosophy and theology in 1925, completed studies in theology in 1928, passed practical theological exams and ordained in the Linköping Diocese in 1929. Served as assistant minister in Hycklinge in 1929, confirmed as minister there in 1930, served as a seafarers' pastor in Antwerp in 1932, became parish priest in Horn in 1936. Chairman of the church and parish assembly, church council, and school board.

credentialEarned.name: Bachelor's Degree in Philosophy and Theology
